Stuff To Do

Some of our favorite places to eat, drink and hangout. If you're going to be in town for a few days, check out a few of them.

    Brooklyn

    • Tacos el Bronco
    • Jpan
    • Naruto
    • Tanoreen
    • Brooklyn Bridge
    • Industry City Distillery Tour/Tasting Room
    • The Levee
    • Prospect Park

    Manhattan

    • ABC Kitchen
    • Vanessa's Dumplings
    • Vegetarian Dimsum Haus
    • AMNH
    • Statue of Liberty
    • Top of the Rock
    • Highline
    • Tenement Museum
    • Finn's (Bay Area sports bar)

    Get a Sweat Going

    • KORE New York
    • Swerve
    • Peloton
